backend/main.mo: Actor with access control managing user profiles and a lead system including creation, retrieval, status updates, and notes.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence record describing a contact configuration update and its associated files, components, and test metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of numerous frontend files covering styling, marketing pages, CRM views, authentication, and React Query hooks.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining global OKLCH design tokens for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entrypoint mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component handling hash-based routing between marketing and CRM views and showing profile setup when needed.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading handling and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog for first‑time users to submit profile details with validation and backend saving.
frontend/src/components/crm/CRMLayout.ts: CRM dashboard layout with auth gating, header navigation, and wrapper for CRM pages.
frontend/src/components/crm/LeadDetailPa: Page for viewing a single lead, updating its status, and adding notes with loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/crm/LeadsListPag: Displays searchable and filterable table of all leads with status badges and error handling.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Marketing site footer with contact info, social links, services list, and service areas.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Responsive site header with navigation, contact links, CRM login button, and mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/leads/LeadCaptur: Lead submission form that validates fields, posts new leads, and shows success or error messages.
Section wrapper that introduces and renders the lead capture form.
frontend/src/components/marketing/HeroSe: Hero banner with marketing content, feature list, imagery, and buttons leading to the quote form.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Market: Composes the main marketing page layout with header, hero, services, areas, testimonials, lead capture, and footer, passing navigation handlers to child components.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Servic: Displays service regions with highlighted locations and contact options using cards and layout components.
Renders a grid of cleaning service offerings, each with icon, description, and feature list.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Testim: Shows customer testimonials with ratings and details in a card grid layout.
frontend/src/config/contact.ts: Defines centralized contact info and helpers for generating tel: and mailto: links.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAddLeadNote.ts: Mutation hook to add a note to a lead and invalidate related lead queries.
Fetches the current authenticated user’s profile once an actor and identity are available.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateLead.ts: Mutation hook for creating leads and refreshing the leads list.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, loading, login, and identity management utilities.
frontend/src/hooks/useLead.ts: Queries a single lead by ID when the user is authenticated and the actor is ready.
frontend/src/hooks/useLeads.ts: Fetches all leads for authenticated users using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useSaveCallerUserProf: Mutation for saving the current user’s profile and invalidating its cache.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdateLeadStatus.t: Mutation to update a lead’s status and refresh both list and individual lead queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and a full light/dark theme using OKLCH CSS variables, and applies global base styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and the Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/utils/errorMessages.ts: Converts backend or network errors into simple user-friendly English messages.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters, supporting hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, animations, and OKLCH variable-driven theming.
project_state.json: Holds the project’s state, requirements, features, and known issues for the Clear Choice Solutions marketing site and CRM.
